title: Sandra Bullock looks lovely in patterned maxi dress as she enjoys outing with adorable pup in LA
text:
She's taken a step back from her successful Hollywood movie career to focus on raising her two children.

And on Tuesday, Sandra Bullock enjoyed an outing with her precious pup in LA.

The Oscar-winning actress was snapped walking the small dog in a park and then carrying it back to her SUV.

Relaxing: Sandra Bullock enjoyed an outing with her precious pup in LA on Tuesday. The Oscar-winning actress was snapped walking the small dog in a park and carrying it to her SUV

Sandra, 55, looked lovely in a long-sleeved patterned maxi dress with a v-neckline.

Her shoulder-length hair was sleekly styled and she sported a pair of sunglasses.

The Bird Box and Blind Side star stepped out in leather slippers and accessorized with a couple of gold necklaces.

The sweet pooch was equally stylish in a pink harness and leash.

Stylish: Sandra, 55, looked lovely in a long-sleeved patterned maxi dress with a v-neckline. Her shoulder-length hair was sleekly styled and she sported a pair of sunglasses

In 2010, Sandra adopted a baby boy and in 2015 she confirmed she had adopted a daughter.

She was last seen on screen in the Netflix horror film Bird Box and the female heist movie Ocean's Eight, both released in 2018.

Her performance in The Blind Side won her a best actress Oscar in 2010 and she was nominated a second time for 2013's Gravity.
description: The Oscar-winning actress was snapped walking the small dog in a park and then carrying him back to her SUV.
